articles.author: Rita Liao
articles.title: China's EV upstart Xpeng ready to take off with flying permit
articles.description: Xpeng, a Chinese electric vehicle upstart, is gearing up to launch its eVTOL into the air as it secures a key regulatory greenlight. Aeroht, owned by Xpeng and Xpeng founder He Xiaopeng, just obtained a special flight permit from the Civil Aviation Administra…

articles.author: Kirsten Korosec
articles.title: Nissan finally shows off the Max-Out EV convertible concept in IRL
articles.description: Nissan has finally showed a physical version of its the Nissan Max Out EV convertible concept ahead of the Nissan Futures event in Japan.
articles.content: Way back in November 2021, Nissan shared renderings of four electric vehicle concepts with intriguing names like Chill-Out, Surf-Out, Hang-Out and Max-Out as part of its announcement to invest $17.6 … [+2068 chars]

articles.author: Ingrid Lunden
articles.title: Zopa, the UK neobank, raises $93M more at a $1B+ valuation
articles.description: After raising $300 million in a round led by SoftBank back in 2021, UK neobank Zopa has closed a deal to put more funding in its coffers.
articles.content: After raising $300 million in a round led by SoftBank back in 2021, UK neobank Zopa has closed a deal to put more funding in its coffers. The company — which provides consumers with lending services,… [+4052 chars]

articles.author: Harri Weber
articles.title: 'Keep Lex filthy': Users react to queer dating app's new direction
articles.description: Lex, the venture-backed queer dating app, is changing. But founder Kel Rakowski says she encourages users to "continue horny posting."
articles.content: Lex, the hookup and social app that launched in 2019 with a nod to lesbian personal ads from the 80s, is changing. Only, precisely how much will change is still an open question. Sure, the venture-ba… [+5592 chars]

articles.author: Natasha Mascarenhas
articles.title: Disclo aims to inspire inclusive workplaces - starting with disability accommodations
articles.description: Disclo is building software that helps employees ask for accommodation requests and activates employers to act on those asks.
articles.content: Disclo CEO and co-founder Hannah Olson was diagnosed with Lyme disease when she was in college. At the time, she didnt really see herself as someone with a disability, even though it meant spending h… [+5324 chars]

articles.title: 'Inaudible' watermark could identify AI-generated voices
articles.description: Resemble AI's proposal for watermarking generated speech may not fix all our worries at once, but it's a step in the right direction.
